content:
Hi, my name is Ava Muffoletto (my kerberos is avamuff). I just submitted a request to be added to 6.100L, but would really appreciate if I could be added to the course website as soon as possible! Also, logistically I am aware that I, unfortunately, missed the first two finger exercises, as well as the first microquiz. Please let me know if there is anything I can do to makeup this work, considering I was able to complete the first microquiz as well as all finger exercises up to this date in the 6.100A/B. 

Thank you for your time!

Best,

Ava Muffoletto
subject: Late registration - logistics of makeups?

content:
Hello, I approved your add into 6.100L. Our class website is here:  https://sicp-s1.mit.edu/6.100L_fa22 

1. Please read the course info and the announcements.
2. Look through the slides for the lectures up to today.
3. I gave you an extension on the first 2 finger exercise until TODAY 3pm. The third is due today at 3pm as well.
4. You missed 1 quiz so far. I used the relevant 6.100A microquiz scores to assign the 6.100L score.
5. You can join our Piazza through the link from our website.
6. Our optional recitation is Fridays at 10am in 37-212
